answers.question: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat

answers.answer: OSS - dApps & Apps GG12-22, Climate Rounds since 2021, OpenCivics Genesis and Round 2 GG20-21, GG20 - $EARTH round, Regen Coordi-Nation Genesis, ENS x Octant Public Goods, GG21 - Web3 Grants Ecosystem Advancement
answers.question: Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.

answers.answer:
Our project enhances the open-source ecosystem by making Web3 accessible to non-technical users and expanding decentralized governance models for real-world communities. We helped develop Inverter Network‚Äôs bounty contracts, bounties dApp, and Control Room interface for non-smart contract developers to be able to deploy a bounties workflow. We developed a forkable, novel approach to Retroactive Public Goods Funding, using labor hours done and verified among relational networks in real life, to determine the distribution of a grants pool. That is documented in our Regenerative Economic Protocol - https://bloomnetwork.earth/learn/whitepaper. 

Additionally, we‚Äôve open-sourced our Decentralized Federated Governance Model, which can be adopted by any Web3 project to support bioregional DAOs and community-led infrastructure ownership. Our community of over 30,000 people, including 300+ grassroots leaders, is actively onboarding to Web3 through our wallet trainings and blockchain education. While our content management system is not currently open source due to security concerns, we ensure meaningful contributions by strengthening key Web3 infrastructure and governance protocols that others can adopt. We hope that our contributions encourage the Ethereum ecosystem to grow the Infinite Garden by collaborating with and supporting real world communities growing community gardens and economic sovereignty.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.

answers.answer: Our app is a full-featured social network that uses Inverter Network‚Äôs smart contracts integrated with a user-friendly web2-like interface. It makes Ethereum bounties accessible to on-the-ground activists who are highly non-technical. Using Para wallet, members can create their first Web3 wallet with fewer hurdles, empowering them to access the decentralized finance tools available on Ethereum which are best-suited to the community coalition-based way they organize on the ground. Our impact reporting form allows them to document their local community actions doing climate, economic sovereignty and mutual aid, in a place that is accessible and readable for the public, yet on-chain, with frictionless experience. Our platform also supports public knowledge sharing, from sharing templates for how to start a crop swap, to how to do participatory budgeting using a DAO, and more, so that people can fork and replicate successful community actions. Grant funds and eventually cooperative profits go to people doing critical work on the ground that is hard to fund through centralized finance, through our novel form of retroactive funding, based on labor hours contributed to local actions.  Lastly, we are forming as a federated cooperative, so the platform is co-owned and governed by local coalitions in real communities. This presents a novel way to run any kind of public infrastructure as a DAO owned by real, in person communities who are accountable to the people and ecosystems where they live.
answers.question: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?

answers.answer: This year we are focused on expanding outreach & visibility to bring more people into the movement. Our goal is to grow to 100 local Bloom nodes and 1,000 members this year, and to grow the amount of funds we are channeling to local climate adaptation, currently at approximately $12,000 per quarter. We also plan to improve the performance (speed) of our app to increase accessibility for rural and Global South participants.
answers.question: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]‚Äîfor example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Bloom Network
project.description:
# Bloom is a place-based social network with a peer incubator for community initiatives.
üîó bloomnetwork.earth
Bloom connects and funds local grassroots coalitions working to restore ecosystems, regenerate economies, and empower local leaders through innovative, community-driven solutions.

# üå± Real-World Impact
Since 2008, Bloom has grown into a **global movement**, engaging **30,000+ people across 32 hubs in 13 countries**. We've helped:
‚úÖ **7,000+ urban and agroecology farms** take root
‚úÖ **1,000+ community enterprises launch**, from co-ops to small businesses
‚úÖ **400+ watershed restoration projects** protect ecosystems
‚úÖ **4 thriving bioregional economies** grow
In the past six months alone, Bloomers have created **230 new wallets** and completed **290 verified bounties** on Optimism for real-world community action. We invite you to support Bloom as part of Ethereum's Infinite Garden! 

***

# üåª How Your Contribution Helps

Bloom connects local climate action with a unique, community-oriented implementation of Web3 bounties, to scale impact and fund grassroots solutions. Your support helps:

* **Onboard first-time users to Web3** with a seamless Web2-like experience
* **Power local media feeds** ‚Äì making it easy to discover & participate in community projects while making friends
* Bloomers **share impact stories** via [**incentivized, image-rich impact reporting**](https://bloomnetwork.earth/member/localactionrewards), inspiring action & peer learning. These automatically post to Karma GAP, reducing the reporting burden for busy local leaders.
* **Equip grassroots leaders** with mentorship, guidance & operational support
* **Grow local treasuries**, financing grassroots development
üìñ  [Read the impact reports here](https://bloomnetwork.earth/communityposts) - they‚Äôre super inspiring!
***
# üåü Local Action Rewards ‚Äì Quarterly Grant Pool
**Our [Regenerative Economic Protocol](https://bloomnetwork.earth/learn/whitepaper)  incentivizes Bloomers to share their impact work, learn from one another, and build healthy bioregional economies.** 

Since Summer 2024, **we've distributed $12,000 per quarter, with a goal of scaling 1,000x**. This funding supports local revenue streams in agroforestry, soil regeneration, and community care while ensuring ‚Äúinvisible labor‚Äù is seen and compensated. This labor is critical to community-building and economic transformation, yet rarely funded in the dominant economy.

***

# üí∞ 2025 Milestones
80% of contributions to this Gitcoin grant go to the Local Action Rewards pool! The remaining 20% will go to operations teams to:
* **Expanding outreach & visibility** to bring more people into the movement. Our goal is to grow to 100 local Blooms and 1,000 members this year
* **Integrating impact report reviews into our app** and out of google sheets for more streamlined, timely delivery to authors
* **Upgrading our integration with Karma GAP** to use the Common Impact Data Standard
üì¢ **Coming Soon!** Bloom Blossoms Podcast: ‚ÄúHow to Do a Needs Assessment‚Äù - Practical guidance for grassroots organizers!
***
# üöÄ Why Bloom?
Our team is **both local community organizers and technologists.** We build tools that real-world leaders **actually need** and can effectively use in their daily work.

*** 

# üîó Support Grassroots Action!
‚úÖ Donate via Gitcoin Grants and share this grant listing
‚úÖ Follow our work: [bloomnetwork.earth](https://bloomnetwork.earth)
üìå **Together, we‚Äôre bringing the next billion people on-chain - while regenerating the planet.**
![grants-Still.png](https://i.postimg.cc/cHTZ7zsM/grants-Still.png)
